      • checkAndPickTemplates

                                                              Sequence sequence,
                                                              int detail,
                                                              java.lang.Boolean info)
        checking all available Templates against the Knowledge Base, pick one and start again, until no more applicable Templates
        Parameters:
        pool - the pool of templates that is available
        log - the current resulting log
        sequence - the current sequence
        detail - the detail level that is required
        info - flag if more information is needed
        Returns:
        log with new sentences
